alert.note: Alert for Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 6:26AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Washington, northeastern Pleasants, northeastern Ritchie, Doddridge, north central Gilmer, Lewis, Tyler and Harrison Counties through 700 AM EDT... At 626 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Woodsfield to 6 miles west of Weston. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clarksburg, Weston, St. Marys, Middlebourne, Bridgeport, Paden City, Shinnston, Stonewood, Nutter Fort, Salem, Sistersville, Pennsboro, Lumberport, West Union, Anmoore, Jackson Mill, Stonewall Jackson, Enterprise, Matamoras and West Milford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 85 and 128. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 40 and 82. Route 33 near mile marker 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Lewis; Pleasants; Ritchie; Tyler
